name: The Werewolf of Wall Street
description:
- Does the inequities perpetuated by corporate finance make you howl with rage? Do you ever think about mooning your boss and quitting?  

 

- Maybe you should EAT your coworkers... That'd make them shut up for once and all. Hey, if you're the only person left on the floor, you're guaranteed the promotion, right?


- Use WASD to chase down your coworkers, and chow down! Once you enter rage mode, you can't exit unless you eat enough coworkers. But be careful not to damage too much corporate decor, or you're toast. Kapeesh?

Made in 9 days for the 2022 NC Collegiate Game Jam.
